import './createcharities.css' import React, { useState } from "react"; function Createcharity({user_id}){ const [name, setName] = useState('') const [description, setDescription] = useState('') const [image, setImage] = useState(''); const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const [license, setLicense] = useState(''); const [error, setError] = useState(''); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); } const newCharity = { name, description, image, email, license, user_id}; fetch ('/charities',{ method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify(newCharity), }) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => { if(data){ alert("Post created successfully"); setImage(''); setDescription() } else { throw new Error ("Failed to create post") } }) .catch((error) => { setError(error.message); }) return( <>

setName(e.target.value)} />
setLicense(e.target.value)} />
setEmail(e.target.value)} />

setDescription(e.target.value)} />
) } export default Createcharity;
